name: CyberDyno
description:
STORY:

You are CYBER, a cybernetically augmented warrior in the distant future.

Team up with your beastly companion DYNO, the genetically enhanced super dinosaur.

Collect the CRYSTAL SKULL OF MAGDAROS and the NUCLEAR HEART OF XYLONUS 5.0 to complete your mission.

MAP CONTROLS:

WASD to move

QE to rotate

Left Click to open chests/doors, loot items

Use mouse to interact with UI

BATTLE CONTROLS:

Select actions for both Cyber and Dyno using the menus

Left Click an enemy to target with Cyber

Right Click an enemy to target with Dyno

Click the ACT button to resolve your turn

Use items and abilities to your advantage!

CREDITS:

SonderGaming - Programming, Art, UI, Battle Design

Ataboo - Programming, Level Design, Map Design, Visual Effects

Gelby - Sound Effects

Quokul The Wizard - Music

Uno - Art, Model Texturing, Concept Art

Imugiwyrm - Concept Art

Roman - Velociraptor Mesh, Player Mesh, Triceratops Mesh
